project.teaser: HSbooster.eu will increase the European standardisation impact coming from H2020 & Horizon Europe Research & Innovation projects, by designing, launching, and managing a dedicated booster-type initiative. HSbooster.eu will draw from the positive and practical experience of the...
project.title: Standardisation Booster for H2020 & HE research results
project.keywords: Booster-type services for H2020 and HE projects

result.title: Final Standards Impact Report
result.description: Projects Onboarded, SDOs engaged, Standards documents contributed to, event reporting, new technologies as a result of the standards work.

result.title: Initial plan for dissemination, exploitation, communication, and training activities (DECTP)
result.description: initial version produced for early launch of all associated activities This deliverable will be led by COMMplas affiliated third party TrustIT

result.title: HSbooster.eu website
result.description: Full HSboostereu web platform published online and fully functional at wwwhsboostereu This deliverable will be led by COMMplas affiliated third party TrustIT

result.title: The HSBooster Training academy and materials
result.description: This deliverable summarises all training activities planned in D5.1 and delivered including information regarding clustering activities. All training packages and materials used, or links to them, will be included.

result.title: Initial Standards Impact Report
result.description: Projects Onboarded, SDOs engaged, Standards documents contributed to, event reporting, new technologies as a result of the standards work.

result.title: Sustainability and exploitation plan
result.description: This deliverable identifies all project assets and identifies both sustainability and exploitation plans for each. Both joint and individual partner plans will be detailed.

result.title: Intermediate Standards Impact Report
result.description: Projects Onboarded, SDOs engaged, Standards documents contributed to, event reporting, new technologies as a result of the standards work.

result.title: DMP - Data Management Plan
result.description: This will deal with protection and availability of the data handled by the project. The DMP is a living document, which will evolve during the lifespan of the project, e.g., with dataset updates or changes in Consortium policies.

result.title: Services matrix
result.description: This deliverable includes a comprehensive description of the service levels and standard operating procedures for experts assessment etc for the entire service range

result.title: Recommendations Report - Framing the future HSbooster.eu Framework Contract
result.description: This deliverable provides objective recommendations for the future HSbooster.eu Framework Contract based on the experiences and lessons learned from the project. The deliverable will be written with the EC as the target audience.

details.authors: Mijatović, I., Tošić, B., Kićanović, A., & Ruso, J.
details.journalTitle: Proceedings of the International Academic Conference on Management, Economics, Business and Marketing (IAC-MEBM 2022)
details.publisher: The Czech Institute of Academic Education z.s

result.title: Lessons learned and service report
result.description: Critical analysis of the rendered services (with impact of the feedback loop). The deliverable aims to constructively assess how effective the services rendered with statistics on increased engagement to SDOs from H2020 & HE projects.

result.title: Interim Call Monitoring Report
result.description: Outcomes of Year 1 Calls and EPE recruitment This deliverable will be led by COMMplas affiliated third party TrustIT

result.title: Ethics Assessment of R&D Supported by Standardisation

details.authors: Mijatović, I., Kićanović, A., & Tošić, B.
details.journalTitle: Book of Abstracts of the 21st Annual STS Conference Graz 2023 titled ''Critical Issues in Science, Technology and Society Studies

result.title: Stakeholder Engagement plan
result.description: This deliverable identifies the main target stakeholder groups to be targeted and provides a plan for engagement activities This deliverable will be led by COMMplas affiliated third party TrustIT

result.title: Periodic Reporting for period 2 - HSbooster.eu (Standardisation Booster for H2020 & HE research results)
result.teaser: HSbooster.eu is a 36-month Coordination and Support Action that provided the European Standardisation Booster. The booster provided expert services to ongoing and completed H2020 and Horizon Europe projects to help them to increase and valorise project results by contributing...

category.title: Report Summary
category.description: Result: Publishable summary (FP7 SESAM) and Summary for publication (H2020 SyGMa)

result.title: Final Call Monitoring Report
result.description: Consolidated outcomes of Year 1&2 Calls, EPE recruitment. This deliverable will be led by COMMpla’s affiliated third party Trust-IT.

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
